ygData.subject: Re: [NBWRPG]  Stasis Pod
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, repair drones are one thing, but drones that fetch new bots are quite another. Using a drone for one task occasionally (the base thing) is allright, but

From: Zardus@...

Ok, repair drones are one thing, but drones that fetch new bots are quite
another. Using a drone for one task occasionally (the base thing) is
allright, but sending them out all the time is not. Please use real bots
from now on.

Also, I'l be using this email for most things from now on, so if you need
to contact me, please send email to Zardus@...

::Havoc/Repressor::

Havoc looks over at the scanners in the engine room, seeing that a new pod
had fallen in europe. He looks to the other members of his group that were
there.

"Lets go check this out. Zardus would probably be pleased if we get a new
bot."

Repressor nods, following Havoc out the door and looking back to see if
Demolition was coming.





On Mon, 30 Apr 2001, James T wrote:

> Magmatron:
> 
>      His scanners picked up a new stasis pod entering
> the atmosphere, it was over Europe. He sent a drone
> after it, one that he could talk through. Then he
> called the Destrocons.
>      "Can one of you please accompany my drone to
> Europe to meet the new Transformer there?" Magmatron
> said sending the coordinates to all of the Destrocons.
